entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.6°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 104.6 kPa falling

Wind: SE 7 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
